title: Did anyone succeeded replacing soldered ram?
message: Just wondering if its doable and durable.

title: Did anyone succeeded replacing soldered ram?
Did anyone succeeded replacing soldered ram?
message: Mba, mbp retina with soldered ram.

title: Did anyone succeeded replacing soldered ram?
message: Of course it is possible and I've done it. But not on a 820-2375 and some stupid "upgrade" ideas some people have. Also RAM very rarely fails, usually corrosion under CPU/RAM.

title: Did anyone succeeded replacing soldered ram?
message: Good to know, is it possible to buy the ram already reballed? Tried to search in differet sites for it with no luck.
